recipesJson.name: Blue Lava
recipesJson.author: Jazzy_girl
recipesJson.description: This is something different than the normal creamy mix that I do.  I took the blue note of the sour blue raspberry and added my fav. Blueberry duo with a dash of lavender to add some depth.  I use a slash of lemon to make the bluberry pop.  It's excellent as a snv!!  It has a hint of flavor like those lavander candies.  This one is so delicious I can't put it down!!! Just give it a mix and you'll see why
